author: Nintendo of America
description:
LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026. 

Build the Legacy of The Batman...The LEGO Batman! Step into this brand-new open-world action adventure game that invites players to embark on Bruce Wayne’s epic journey to become the hero of Gotham City. Inspired by decades of Batman films, television, comic books, and games, this latest LEGO adventure is packed with classic Batman nostalgia, DC lore, and TT Games’ signature brand of fun-filled LEGO humor. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #LEGOBatmanGame 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight – Official Reveal Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Little Nightmares III creeps onto Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch on Oct 10, 2025! Pre-order now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/little-nightmares-iii-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Strap in for the ride of your life, Little Ones. The terrors are just getting started…  

#NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 #LittleNightmaresIII
